text: [po prichine] ikh nadmennosti na zemle i zlonamerennogo ukhishchreniya. No zloye ukhishchreniye porazhayet lish' togo, kto tvorit yego. Neuzheli oni ozhidayut chego-libo inogo, krome togo, chto postiglo drevniye pokoleniya? Ty nikak ne naydesh' zameny dlya nakazaniya Allakhom, nikak ne uklonish'sya ot Yego nakazaniya
